abstract: CardioNet, a health care technology start-up which Citigroup is taking public on Wednesday, cut the number of shares it allocated in half and lowered the price after several big shareholders backed out of the offering.
lead_paragraph: CardioNet, a health care technology start-up which Citigroup is taking public on Wednesday, cut the number of shares it allocated in half and lowered the price after several big shareholders backed out of the offering.
